title: I've been everywhere
creator_credit: Rob Flisher, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Robert Flisher was excited to leave Australia and see the world as it was his childhood dream to join the Navy. Flisher opens up about his experiences with the Navy and talks about some of the exciting places he visited during his service.
creator_credit_for_label: Rob Flisher, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
